name: Kadakia Trading
description: retailing a remarkable range of Water Me
overview:
Established in the year 1947, we, “Kadakia Trading Corporation”, are engaged in retailing commendable range of Water Meter. Under this range, we offer Cyble Version Meter, Standard Version Meter and Multimag Cyble Meter.

Our Team: Procurement agents Quality controllers Packaging experts Administrators Managers

Quality Assurance: We are deeply committed to provide the best and efficient range of Water Meter. To fulfill our promise, we endeavor to procure all the products from the distinguished names of the industry. This range is manufactured using high-grade basic material and automated techniques at our vendors base.

Vendor Base: We have been in association with the eminent names of this discipline, which fosters us to bring forth the best range of Water Meter. Their specialization over their domain have made them prominent names of the industry.

Client Satisfaction: Kadakia Trading Corporation, stands upon a foundation of basic values of integrity & transparency and its commitment to quality. Being a responsible entity, we endeavor to bring forth commendable range of Water Meter.
